page.title: 07 MY CRICKET CLUB
page.content: The cricket club that I go to is called Chard Cricket Club,every Friday at 6 oclock.Then we go in to the club house with the two umpires and they are our coaches too. They tell us what we must do to keep our wicket.After we have finished the game we go into the club house and have some orange drink. the game that we play is basically like the grown ups game but there are different from the grown up game.To start we only have 5 overs between each pair,and when your out you have 8 runs taken off the score and then you keep on playing.Two of your players do the scoring for your team.When we took over the foreign countries the English taught the people there how to play the game ,and now they have better teams than us .
